title: Quiz asks about letter K availability heuristic

content.prompt: During a quiz, a student is asked, “Which is more common in the English language, the letter “k” as the first letter in a word or the letter “k” as the third letter in a word?” Which of the following would be the student’s likely response if he relied on the availability heuristic to answer the question?

choices.label: He would say that “k” is more likely as the first letter of words because those are the first words that come to his mind.
He would arrive at his answer by referring to earlier questions on the quiz.
He would answer that “k” is more likely as the third letter of words because he would focus more on the second part of the question that was asked.
He would systematically find and record all words beginning with “k” and all words with “k” as the third letter.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
